price: 166. Marka kuwii la raacay (ee madaxda ahaa) iska barii yeelaan kuwii raacay, oo ay arkaan cadaabka, oo uu kala go'o xidhiidhkoodii.
arabic: إِذۡ تَبَرَّأَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتُّبِعُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُواْ وَرَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتۡ بِهِمُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَابُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh tabarra-a alladhīna ittubiʿū mina alladhīna ittabaʿū wara-awū al-ʿadhāba wataqaṭṭaʿat bihimu al-asbābu
